title: Ugh I sometimes cannot cast when I join a game.
body: So there is this really weird bug where sometimes if I join a game I cannot cast anything or use any abilities and can only fix this via closing the client and restarting again. I was really wondering how this could be fixed or why this is happening. Thanks :D

replies.body: I encountered this issue as well for a while, but only after I got a new laptop that was touchscreen. I found that, if I disabled the touch screen functionality, I stopped getting this annoying bug. So if you have a touch screen, try disabling that functionality. Hope I helped!

Do you see any "attempting to reconnect" messages or notice any other behavior? This could be caused by connection drops or even third-party programs running in the background. With some more info, I can help you out further.

There's no fix,just restart the game...
Try not to look your browse when you are joining the game
